__e: We will find Agnes and her child.
I am Agnes, and if there is anything that you need at all, you can just let me know. Hmm?
Just put it in the basket with the others and I'll write a note to give it special attention.
It's alright, heh! It's all right!
I just gotta find Agnes, or Margaret, or whatever you call her.
I mean, Agnes, she's a very nice woman, but she's not your mother.
Agnès is the basis of everything.
Sister Agnes shared these with me.
And you know, Agnes never said anything...
Uh, no, Agnes, I gotta go.
Agnes, I hate myself for disappearing on you, but I never gave up.
